movie.title: Man Bites Dog
movie.description_intro: A camera crew follows a serial killer/thief around as he exercises his craft. He expounds on art, music, nature, society, and life as he offs mailmen, pensioners, and random people. Slowly he begins involving the camera crew in his activities, and they begin wondering if what they're doing is such a good idea, particularly when the killer kills a rival and the rival's brother sends a threatening letter.
movie.description_full: A camera crew follows a serial killer/thief around as he exercises his craft. He expounds on art, music, nature, society, and life as he offs mailmen, pensioners, and random people. Slowly he begins involving the camera crew in his activities, and they begin wondering if what they're doing is such a good idea, particularly when the killer kills a rival and the rival's brother sends a threatening letter.

movies.title: Elfette Saves Christmas
movies.summary: Elfette has to save the day when Santa Claus is kidnapped by the mafia, who try to take over Christmas.
movies.description_full: Elfette has to save the day when Santa Claus is kidnapped by the mafia, who try to take over Christmas.
movies.synopsis: Elfette has to save the day when Santa Claus is kidnapped by the mafia, who try to take over Christmas.

movies.title: Sandy Wexler
movies.summary: Sandy Wexler (Adam Sandler) is a talent manager working in Los Angeles in the 1990s, diligently representing a group of eccentric clients on the fringes of show business. His single-minded devotion is put to the test when he falls in love with his newest client, Courtney Clarke, a tremendously talented singer whom he discovers at an amusement park. Over the course of a decade, the two of them play out a star-crossed love story.

movies.title: The Incredible Jessica James
movies.summary: An aspiring playwright in New York strikes up a friendship with a guy while on the rebound from a break-up.
movies.description_full: An aspiring playwright in New York strikes up a friendship with a guy while on the rebound from a break-up.
movies.synopsis: An aspiring playwright in New York strikes up a friendship with a guy while on the rebound from a break-up.

movies.title: Memoirs of an Invisible Man
movies.summary: Nick Halloway is made invisible during an accident. When Jenkins finds out about Nick, he set out to recruit him into the world of espionage, seeing the potential for an invisible CIA agent. When Alice Monroe falls in love with Nick, they are forced to flee the attentions of Jenkins. Nick also has the problem of living invisibly whilst trying to find a cure.
